archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.5.6b: b) directly involves the person to whom the password uniquely applies (e.g. in-person registration in a secure location or via registered delivery requiring the person's proof of identification and their signature)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
